metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18310 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in dwfl_segment_report_module.c in libdwfl in elfutils through v0.174. The vulnerability allows attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) with a crafted ELF file, as demonstrated by consider_notes.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-18310` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

debuginfod - 0.176-1.1
elfutils - 0.176-1.1
libasm1 - 0.176-1.1
libdebuginfod-common - 0.176-1.1
libdebuginfod1 - 0.176-1.1
libdw1 - 0.176-1.1
libelf1 - 0.176-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
